author: sandygao
msg: 1. XSDHandler is always expecting an entity resolver, so if the application didn't
set one, we should use entity manager (the default implmenation) instead.

author: sandygao
msg: In some cases (preparse a grammar via dom3 as api, for example), there is
no current entity. This check prevents seme NPE to happen.
